Your eidolon's attack evolves. Choose one of your eidolon's starting melee unarmed attacks. It gains one of the following traits, chosen when you gain the feat: [disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [grapple](/Traits.aspx?ID=184), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193), [trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196), or [versatile bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing](/Traits.aspx?ID=200).
